short_description: This function estimates the number of distinct values.
long_description: This function estimates the number of distinct values in a column or combinations of columns, while scanning the table only once.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the input data.

argument_clauses.name: InputColumns
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name(s) of the column or columns for which an approximate distinct count will be calculated.

argument_clauses.name: ErrorRate
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the acceptable error rate, expressed using decimal representation. The input value must be no less than 0.05 and no greater than 10.0. The default value is 10.0.
